item.description:
Many hundred years ago, in the country across the sea and mountains lived an ancient eastern nation. They were ruled by cordial and gracious Emperor who was the main reason of their stable and peaceful existence. To proceed the Emperor’s graceful time people believed in him and served him. On the other hand, the Emperor had many foxy enemies. One day, the emperor received an invitation to the marriage ceremony. Betrayers immediately took advantage of the situation, attacked the emperor with poisonous liquids and killed him. The Emperor has gone. Your day is now to make your mark on Eastern History! A man leaves behind marks that associate his name with symbol of either admiration or hatred.

Number of players: The design of this mystic game based on Eastern History where 1-6 players act as heir to the throne. Those that were not frightened showed courage and determination and reshape the history of the East.

Time required: A single game takes approximately 15-20 minutes per player. Eastern Mystery is a well-ordered, complex and smooth game. In other words, the game is intuitive and simple enough for new gamers to be able to jump right in with plenty of tasks to complete. Additionally. By giving in the player becomes an underdog, and hunts down his fellow players.
The board shows an ancient carpet with original eastern features and players take turns rolling dice on 18x6 grid to conquer six different thrones.
Six different Characters, particularly different Tiles and their relationships define the game as a rule-based system specifying what there is, how the player can interact with them. Points are awarded for collecting sets of thrones, and in the end of final set the player with the most points becomes the winner. 
Eastern Mystery uses simple rules, but involves various tasks such as “Open Sesame” “Flying carpet”, “Doors” and “Jinnee” our famous figure: which is very curious about all and interested in your curiosity as well! The more you play the more nuances you will discover. The player who gains the maximum number of thrones in the end will be crowned as the winner! 
Prove your worth in an intense duel against an intricate game.

—description from the designer

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
